Body:
poisson = Poisson(rand=None, lam=2, xlim=(0, 10), N=7)
x, y = poisson.data
for i, j in zip(x, [0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 10]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
for i, j in zip(y, [0.135335283, 0.270670566, 0.180447044, 0.0360894089, 
    0.012029803, 0.00085927164, 3.81898506e-05]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
